system.requirements:
Tier 2; Strength 45
Aptitudes: Strength, Offence, Nurgle
system.effect:
Can Fire Heavy Weapons on Semi-Auto Burst or Full-Auto Burst without Bracing, not suffering the -30 penalty. 
Additionally, add +20 when using the Heft Special Use of the Athletics Skill.

description.value: Can Fire Heavy Weapons on Semi-Auto Burst or Full-Auto Burst without Bracing, not suffering the -30 penalty. Additionally, add +20 when using the Heft Special Use of the Athletics Skill.
